title: Remote Desktop Gateway Password
author: becatini
body_snippet:
# Remote Desktop Gateway Password

I have hundreds of servers configured on my mRemoteNG app, and we use gateway credentials.
When I have to change my LDAP user password, it is a big headache since I have to change the gateway password for each server.

If I export the configuration to a XML file I cannot see an option to change the gateway password.
Is there a way to change the gateway password for all servers at once?

Thanks.

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
There would be the inheritance feature (see https://mremoteng.readthedocs.io/en/latest/folders_and_inheritance.html, http://forum.mremoteng.org/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=2097) to reduce the amount of times you need to define the credentials. 

(And yes, the documentation might be improved, there are already open issues that refer to that like #1968 )
